title: Bug 128359: Incorrect logic when applying a filter to the table on the layout
description: We observe that the dataset has 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: When dragging the dataset to the layout and setting an additional filter (FilterB) on the table, the actual result is that the output of FilterB is based on DataResultA.
EB: The expected result is that the output of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
SR:
1. Drag the dataset to the layout.
2. Set another filter (FilterB) on the table.
3. Observe that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA instead of DataResultB.
